intent_atoms.description: Execute the ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests suite on macOS hardware to validate end-to-end SwiftUI streaming selection flow and capture evidence of stable automation outside Linux container.
ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests executes on macOS with UI automation enabled and reports success.
Resulting logs/screenshots are archived for future regression comparison and attached to the task record.
Any macOS-specific issues discovered are filed with actionable follow-up items or patches.
Documentation (next_tasks.md, backlog, automation notes) updated to reflect completion status.
The test is skipped on Linux because Combine and SwiftUI automation are unavailable.
Use a macOS runner with XCTest UI entitlement; preferred invocation via xcodebuild test command targeting ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests.
Ensure SwiftUI accessibility permissions granted to the test runner, pre-authorized in System Settings → Privacy & Security → Accessibility.
Capture and store DerivedData xcresult bundle for evidence; upload alongside a short execution summary in DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE when complete.

functional_units.name: ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests
functional_units.description: XCTest UI test suite that validates SwiftUI streaming selection flow on macOS

functional_units.name: macOS Runner Execution
functional_units.description: Running tests on a physical or CI-hosted macOS runner with XCTest UI entitlement

functional_units.name: SwiftUI Accessibility Permission Setup
functional_units.description: Pre-authorizing SwiftUI accessibility permissions in System Settings for automated UI testing

functional_units.name: DerivedData xcresult Capture
functional_units.description: Capturing and storing the DerivedData xcresult bundle as evidence of test execution

functional_units.name: Artifact Archival
functional_units.description: Uploading execution summary and xcresult bundle to DOCS/TASK_ARCHIVE for regression comparison
